source.e5c2eff2:
Q1, Q3 = default['Bank Balance'].quantile([.25, .75])
IQR = Q3 - Q1
LL = Q1 - 1.5*(IQR)
UL = Q3 + 1.5*(IQR)

df = default[default['Bank Balance'] > UL]
df['Defaulted?'].count()
source.e281722f: default['Bank Balance'] = np.where(default['Bank Balance'] > UL, UL, default['Bank Balance'] )
